safire.data.unsupervised_dataset module¶

class safire.data.unsupervised_dataset.UnsupervisedDataset(data, n_in, n_out)[source]¶

Bases: safire.data.dataset.Dataset

Storage class for supervised datasets.

Expects the data to be split into a train/devel/test set, with a response vector for each of the datasets.

Supports exporting batches.

devel_X_batch(b_index, b_size)[source]¶

Slices a batch of devel_X for given batch index and batch size.

Parameters:
  • b_index (int) – The order of the batch in the dataset (0 for first, 1 for second, etc.)
  • b_size (int) – The size of one batch.
Returns:

A slice of the shared variable devel_X starting at b_index * b_size and ending at (b_index + 1) * b_size.
Raises:

ValueError
n_devel_batches(batch_size)[source]¶

Determines how many batches of given size the development data will be split into.

Parameters:batch_size (int) – The intended size of one batch of the data.
Returns:The number of batches the devel data will be split into for given batch_size.
n_test_batches(batch_size)[source]¶

Determines how many batches of given size the test data will be split into.

Parameters:batch_size (int) – The intended size of one batch of the data.
Returns:The number of batches the test data will be split into for given batch_size.
n_train_batches(batch_size)[source]¶

Determines how many batches of given size the training data will be split into.

Note

These functions are not factored out to Dataset because it isn’t sufficiently clear at that level which variable to derive the train/devel/test data subset size from. (This is the same for UnsupervisedDataset and SupervisedDataset, but may not be same for others - a design decision needs to be made.)

Parameters:batch_size (int) – The intended size of one batch of the data.
Returns:The number of batches the training data will be split into for given batch_size.

Slices a batch of test_X for given batch index and batch size.

Parameters:
  • b_index (int) – The order of the batch in the dataset (0 for first, 1 for second, etc.)
  • b_size (int) – The size of one batch.
Returns:

A slice of the shared variable test_X starting at b_index * b_size and ending at (b_index + 1) * b_size.
Raises:

ValueError
train_X_batch(b_index, b_size)[source]¶

Slices a batch of train_X for given batch index and batch size.

Parameters:

  • b_size (int) – The size of one batch.
Returns:
